price: Anaasε (Nkͻmhyεni, Nsεmpa a woka kyerε wͻn no), wobisa wͻn εho akatua εna enti ayε εka asoa wͻn?
arabic: أَمۡ تَسۡـَٔلُهُمۡ أَجۡرٗا فَهُم مِّن مَّغۡرَمٖ مُّثۡقَلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: am tasaluhum ajran fahum min maghramin muth'qalūna
